snippet: The Supreme Court seemed prepared to strike down a part of federal campaign finance law setting overall limits on direct contributions from individuals to candidates. The Times’s Adam Liptak offered analysis of the arguments.
lead_paragraph: The Supreme Court seemed prepared to strike down a part of federal campaign finance law setting overall limits on direct contributions from individuals to candidates. The Times’s Adam Liptak offered analysis of the arguments.

headline.seo: Key Moments From the Hearing on Campaign Contributions
headline.main: Key Moments From the Hearing on Campaign Contributions
